name: Algo Visualizer
desc: Algo Visualizer is a tool designed to visualize various algorithms, focusing on sorting and searching algorithms.

name: Restaurant MS
desc: Full-Stack Restaurant Management System using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Php. Reliable for both Manager and users.

name: Tic - Tac - Toe
desc: Designed a two-player Tic-Tac-Toe game that offers a simple yet satisfying experience for players designed using react

name: Volunteer Portal App
desc: The Volunteer Portal Mobile App is a comprehensive solution designed to efficiently manage volunteers' participation in various events. Its primary purpose is to provide a user-friendly platform for volunteers to easily sign up, log in, and manage their involvement according to their convenience. Using android studio with firebase database
